mapper.select: select welcome_note_no as no, minihome_no as miniHomeNo, welcome_note_emotion as emotion, welcome_note_photo_filename as photoFilename, welcome_note_content as content, welcome_note_display as display, welcome_note_deleted as deleted, welcome_note_created_date as createdDate from minihome_welcome_notes where minihome_no = #{value} and welcome_note_display = 'Y' and welcome_note_deleted = 'N'
